item.description:
Falmouth Cinema Pub

Offers a beer, wine and food selection whereas you can sit down and have a meal at a table while watching a movie!  A great alternative to just soda, popcorn, or candy!

 

Water For Elephants: Start Time 7:00 pm (2 Hrs Running Time)

During the Great Depression, Jacob, a penniless and recently-orphaned veterinary school student, parlays his expertise with animals into a job with a second-rate traveling circus. He falls in love with Marlena, one of the show's star performers, but their romance is complicated by Marlena's husband, the charismatic but unbalanced circus boss.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be wearing our Girl's Just Wanna Have Fun Pins!
item.why: We love movies!!! Can't get enough of them!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Have dinner and a movie! Water for Elephants
